title: "As is The Gardener, So is The Garden" ornate blackletter/oldstyle face
content:
Can someone point me into the right direction to find something with similiar caps as in this reference:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082043im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letter_6075.jpg)

It's from this clip that you might like... [http://www.hotelworldwide.com/projects/2007/08/As\_is\_the\_Gardener\_\_\_/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082043/http:/www.hotelworldwide.com/projects/2007/08/As_is_the_Gardener___/ "http://www.hotelworldwide.com/projects/2007/08/As\_is\_the\_Gardener\_\_\_/")
author: mlvr

comments.content:
You could have a look at [Dieter Steffmanns font collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082043/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm). There are a few fraktur styles there.

BTW: Here's a better picture...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082043im_/http:/typophile.com/files/better_3794.jpg)

Ah, thanks... My screenshot where from a youtube version :-D

-  
Max
